title: Sidewall, 1940
description: A floral bouquet of roses and assorted flowers in a medallion with a frame of Rococo scrolls. Arranged in diagonal pattern. Entire paper is embossed with fine parallel horizontal lines. Printed in mauve-gray, white, rose and green on peach field.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sidewall, 1940.
1940. Machine-printed. Gift of Margaret W. Hobson. 1946-95-2.
